get_data1.p1: Itri.living Resorts is a hospitality brand (under construction) dedicated to providing  authentic travel experiences in exotic places, starting with Morocco.
get_data1.p2: With a mission to offer luxury and authentic travel, Itri Living Resorts focuses on delivering exceptional travel experience.
get_data1.p3: Through long-term partnerships with property developers at the very early stages, we offer tailor-made, bespoke hospitality that align with our core values of authenticity, well-being. Our objective is to develop our brand through four locations in Morocco and the Mediterranean, by summer 2030.
get_data1.p4: Itri Living Resorts first location will be in Morocco's bouyant economic region of Casablanca
get_data1.title: Itri Living Resorts

get_data2.p1: At Itri.Living, we value luxury, authenticity, and well-being.
get_data2.p10: This vision is shared accross all Itri Living resorts to come
get_data2.p13: Itri Living locations enjoy in-house Spa and Fitness, with yoga, aqua-gym in our in-door pool, and much more
get_data2.p15: We project the values of authenticity through our cuisine, the people....
get_data2.p19: These are what we know are valuable experiences for our community.
get_data2.title: x

get_data3.b1: Benefits to be found in all our
get_data3.b5: State-of-the-art facilities and services on site including pools, fitness amenities, a wellness center, and more.

get_data5.d3: Each stay is more than a simple escape — it’s an opportunity to connect with nature, immerse yourself in local culture, and create lasting memories that embody the true essence of travel.
get_data5.d4: At Itri Living, your journey is illuminated by ‘Itri’ the star that represents our dedication to authentic and meaningful experiences.

get_data6.e4: THREE OTHER beachfront projects, on the Mediterranean Sea and Atlantic Ocean, are under consideration with an objective to be operational BY SUMMER 2030.
get_data6.e5: Our Product Development team is also busy identifying potential Resorts that align with our values
get_data6.e6: While we aim to develop a diverse catalog of properties for Itri COMMUNITY, there is no guarantee that the tailor-made projects will be built IN-TIME, or that they will be in the specific location mentioned.
get_data6.e7: However, we are committed to making every effort to offer a rich selection of

get_data7.f12: Each community member will have the opportunity to purchase up to 30 accommodation days every year, at Itri Living resorts, at a significant discount to market price
get_data7.f14: We will make every effort to introduce four new first tailor-made resort developed by our partner asset developer to our specific standards, by summer 2030
get_data7.f16: By the summer 2026 holiday season, we will start operations in our first location, in in costal city of Bouznika (half way between Rabat and Casablanca)
get_data7.f3: Itri.living has entered into a strategic Agreement with x
get_data7.f9: We are dedicated to ensuring that membership brings you exceptional value and exclusive opportunities.

dataFaq.question: What is Itri.Living?
dataFaq.answer: Itri Living is a brand, dedicated to providing luxurious and authentic travel experiences in exotic locations. By leveraging  technology, and partnering with  asset developers early on, we create bespoke resorts that reflect our values of well-being, authenticity, luxury.

dataFaq.question: How does Itri Living work?
dataFaq.answer: Itri Living offers accomodation experiences on carefuling selected resorts. Guest can book stays at our resorts and enjoy exclusive benefits and discounts with each reservation.

dataFaq.question: What makes Itri Living unique?
dataFaq.answer: One dedicated resorts will be designed to be environmentally friendly, combining eco-responsible architecture with local traditions. We offer immersive experiences focused on sustainability and authenticity, and luxury

dataFaq.question: What types of experiences does Itri Living offer?
dataFaq.answer: We offer a range of experiences: relaxation in spas, water sports, hiking, yoga, and cultural immersion, all with a strong focus on ecological and community engagement.

dataFaq.question: Where are Itri Living resorts located?
dataFaq.answer: Our first resorts will focus on beachfront locations in the Mediterranean sea. Discussions are ongoing for locations.

dataFaq.question: Who are the partners of Itri Living?
dataFaq.answer: We will partner with both innovative  projects as well as etablished hospitality services companies, to bring value to our Community. Our partnership agreement with TURA NFTs Marketplace is a perfect exemple of this synergy

dataFaq.question: How can I take advantage of the exclusive offers and discounts?
dataFaq.answer: We will start offering Itri tokens to our Community, once we have purshased and tokenised Accomodation rights

dataFaqHeader.description: If our Membership FAQs are not enough, feel free to book a call with us and we’ll be happy to assist you!
